thread.title: Some Companies Play It Safe in Super Bowl Ads

author: Suzanne Vranica
title: Some Companies Play It Safe in Super Bowl Ads
text:
This year’s Super Bowl ads will feature Amazon.com Inc.’s Alexa losing her voice, actors Morgan Freeman and Peter Dinklage having a lip-sync battle, and factory workers bottling water for people in disaster areas.
Humor, nostalgia and humanitarianism will be among the main themes, as many marketers look to play it safe and steer clear of controversy.
